statements: SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_date FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, treatment_outcome FROM Patients WHERE treatment_outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Patients WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_outcome FROM Patients WHERE treatment_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(patient_id) AS avg_id FROM Patients WHERE treatment_outcome = 'Successful';
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS total_treatments FROM Patients GROUP BY patient_name HAVING total_treatments > 1 ORDER BY total_treatments DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name FROM Patients WHERE treatment_outcome = 'Failed';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, dob FROM Patients ORDER BY dob DESC;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_type = 'Surgery';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_type, outcome FROM Treatments ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE dob > '1980-01-01' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, dob FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND address LIKE '%Lane%';

SELECT Patients.first_name, Treatments.treatment_type FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE Treatments.outcome = 'Successful' ORDER BY Patients.last_name DESC, Treatments.treatment_date ASC;

SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, treatment_type FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE Treatments.treatment_date < '2022-01-01' OR Treatments.outcome IS NULL ORDER BY Patients.first_name ASC, Patients.last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(treatment_id) AS num_treatments FROM treatments GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE stem_cell_count > 500 ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patients.patient_id, patients.patient_name, treatments.treatment_date FROM patients LEFT JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id;
SELECT doctors.doctor_name, COUNT(treatments.treatment_id) AS total_treatments FROM doctors LEFT JOIN treatments ON doctors.doctor_id = treatments.doctor_id GROUP BY doctors.doctor_name;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_type FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, doctor_name, patient_name FROM appointments JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_type FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE treatments.treatment_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;

SELECT patient_name, treatment_date, treatment_outcome FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE treatment_outcome = 'Successful' AND treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT appointment_date, patient_name, doctor_name FROM appointments JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender='M';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT cell_id, cell_type, storage_location FROM StemCells WHERE availability=true;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM Locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'F' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;

SELECT Patients.first_name, Treatments.treatment_date, Treatments.treatment_type FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE Treatments.treatment_type = 'Chemotherapy';
SELECT StemCells.cell_id, StemCells.cell_type, Locations.location_name FROM StemCells JOIN Locations ON StemCells.storage_location = Locations.location_name WHERE StemCells.availability = TRUE;

SELECT Patients.first_name, Treatments.treatment_type, PatientTreatmentHistory.outcome FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id JOIN PatientTreatmentHistory ON Patients.patient_id = PatientTreatmentHistory.patient_id WHERE Treatments.treatment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND Treatments.treatment_date <= '2022-12-31';
